channel.title: How to do gloss buttons
channel.description:
So this might seem like an odd thing to ask. But i just need a simple tutorial or explanation on how to make a glossy button or background. What I mean is something like this: [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/IMVU/images/navigation/nav_background.gif[/img]
And making the hover would be nice too :) [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/IMVU/images/navigation/nav_hover.gif[/img]
I'm not asking for someone to make them, I want to make them myself. I just don't know how
Edit: How do these look: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hg5yrp.png[/img] Hover: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/jauq03.png[/img]
Yes i did make em.

item.title: How to do gloss buttons
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:


There’s a couple more. I changed the glow and the top color is a darker shade

Read full topic

item.title: How to do gloss buttons
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:5, topic:454060”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=556934.msg4077859#msg4077859 date=1345043628]
You, my friend, are no help what so ever. I asked for a “How To” on how to make these. Then I decided to have a crack at it, and posted my results. Don’t just tell me what I did wrong. Give me some tips on how to fix it.
[/quote]

I gave you a breakdown of what I thought the image was, using key words that when followed would produce (roughly) the example image I provided, does the lack of numbered steps not qualify that as a “How To”?

Follow Frells advice and Google it[/quote]
I actually did google it. The attempt was after googling and reading a few tutorials. I found how they made the glow, using a shape then applying a Gaussian blur. And maybe a Motion Blur if the image you edited isn’t wide enough.
I think my issue was that I didn’t select 2 close enough colors.

Read full topic

item.title: How to do gloss buttons
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You, my friend, are no help what so ever. I asked for a “How To” on how to make these. Then I decided to have a crack at it, and posted my results. Don’t just tell me what I did wrong. Give me some tips on how to fix it.

I gave you a breakdown of what I thought the image was, using key words that when followed would produce (roughly) the example image I provided, does the lack of numbered steps not qualify that as a “How To”?

Follow Frells advice and Google it

Read full topic

item.title: How to do gloss buttons
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:2, topic:454060”]The top one looks like two solids, bottom one black and the top a tiny bit off black with a feathered solid over it the same color as the top solid, but with low opacity

Bottom looks the same but with a blue feathered solid near the bottom

http://i.imgur.com/J9Om8.png[/quote]

You, my friend, are no help what so ever. I asked for a “How To” on how to make these. Then I decided to have a crack at it, and posted my results. Don’t just tell me what I did wrong. Give me some tips on how to fix it.

Read full topic
